titleStmt.title: Raree show, or, The true Protestant procession a new ballad to the tune of the Northumberland man.
titleStmt.author: Colledge, Stephen, 1635?-1681, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Stephen Colledge. cf. NUC; Wing.
Verse - "This is the cabal of some Protestant lords (had,".
Item identified on UMI microfilm as C5226B (entry cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
Reproduction of originals in: Harvard University Library; Folger Shakespeare Library.
